author: Michael Ruiz
title: Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot: Illinois stay-at-home order could continue into June
description: Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot said Tuesday that Illinois’ coronavirus stay-at-home order might stretch into May or even June, according to local reports.
content:

Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot said Tuesday that Illinois’ coronavirus stay-at-home order might remain in place well into May or even June, according to local reports.… [+2262 chars]
